verbs.description: [ARG0: Former NBA star Dennis Rodman] [V: says] [ARG1: he will travel to Singapore for the historical summit between President Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un] .
Former NBA star Dennis Rodman says he [V: will] travel to Singapore for the historical summit between President Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un .
Former NBA star Dennis Rodman says [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: travel] [ARG1: to Singapore] [ARGM-PRP: for the historical summit between President Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un] .
